────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Bitcoin could see a wild ride with bids set at $94K and $82K.
• A trader’s ready to pounce if the market freaks out.
• This move could shake things up or stabilize the game.

Impact — These bids could either catch a falling knife or prop up Bitcoin’s price, depending on how the market swings.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/bitcoin-crash-brewing-trader-puts-bids-at-usd94k-and-usd82k-for-potential-market-freakout
